Beto O: Rourke's campaign claimed that the latest polls showed him tied neck-and-neck with Senator Ted Cruz.
The claim was supported by a Facebook po: Rourke's campaign stating that he out-raised Cruz in the second financial quarter without taking any money from PACs.
O: Rourke's campaign provided a link to a news story that reported a statewide poll showing O'Rourke and Castro running even with Cruz. The poll was conducted by the Texas Lyceum, a leadership group, and included 1,000 respondents.
